text: Angel Lozano is an electrical engineer at Universitat Pompeu Fabra in Barcelona, Spain. He was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for his contributions to multiple-input, multiple-output antenna systems. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Spanish engineers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Angel Lozano
